title: 怎么使圈领地的格数变大
author: zlt
txt_content: 怎么让自己圈领地圈的更大啊，我建了个服务器，圈主城的时候一直显示你圈的领地范围太大

replies.author: ZENONIA4
replies.txt_content: 你分开来设置不就得了

replies.author: mayier318
replies.txt_content:
打开领地插件配置
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 16
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 16
改这两个数值，重启
